Example Scammer UUID.reported_ign: IGN of scammer when report was sent
Example Scammer UUID.reported_discord: Discord ID of scammer when report was sent. Can be null.
Example Scammer UUID.report_time: Epoch timestamp of when the report was verified and inputted into the database. Stored in milliseconds just like the Hypixel API.
Example Scammer UUID.reporter_ign: IGN of reporter when report was sent
Example Scammer UUID.reporter_uuid: Minecraft UUID of the person who reported the scam. Can be null.
Example Scammer UUID.reporter_discord: Discord ID of the person who reported the scam.
Example Scammer UUID.evidence: URL to an imgur album containing the photo evidence. Evidence may be modified to censor personal information, and not all evidence will be uploaded.
Example Scammer UUID.associated_staff_signature: Signature of the Paradise staff member responsible, usually the discord name of the staff member along with some other information about them.
